benchmark_details.name: NICO (Natural Interactive COnversation)
benchmark_details.overview: NICO is a Natural Interactive Conversation dataset in Chinese designed to evaluate the ability of large language models (LLMs) to simulate natural human conversations and to improve their conversational capabilities through fine-tuning. The dataset consists of dialogues covering 20 daily topics and incorporates five types of social interactions, with a focus on fluency, coherence, and naturalness.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve the conversational abilities of LLMs by providing a dataset that fosters more natural dialogue interactions.

data.source: Constructed dialogues generated using GPT-4-turbo and revised by native Chinese speakers.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by native Chinese speakers to ensure grammatical correctness and naturalness of conversations.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on human evaluations and conventional text evaluation methods.
methodology.interpretation: Fluency measures grammatical correctness, coherence assesses logical correctness and relevance, and naturalness reflects how closely the dialogues resemble human conversations.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative evaluation against other dialogue datasets such as NaturalConv, KdConv, and DailyDialog.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset ensures no personal privacy violations and contains no sensitive content.
